title.rendered: India vs Australia, 3rd ODI: Fantasy Team, Probable Playing XIs, Pitch Report & Fantasy Tips

content.rendered:
We have opted for a fantasy cricket team based on recent performances, overall impact, and credit points.

Probable XIs

India: Rohit Sharma (c), Shubman Gill, Virat Kohli, Suryakumar Yadav, KL Rahul (wk), Hardik Pandya, Ravindra Jadeja, Axar Patel, Kuldeep Yadav, Mohammed Shami, Mohammed Siraj

While David Warner missed both ODIs, Glenn Maxwell was rested in the second game due to fitness concerns.

Australia: Travis Head, Mitchell Marsh, Steven Smith (c), Marnus Labuschagne, Alex Carey (wk), Cameron Green, Marcus Stoinis, Sean Abbott, Nathan Ellis, Mitchell Starc, Adam Zampa

Pitch Report

Venue: MA Chidambaram Stadium, Chennai

(Based on the last three games)

1st innings average score: 289

2nd innings average score: 298

Wickets per innings: 7

Type: Balanced

Wins

Batting 1st: 67%

Batting 2nd: 33%

Also Read:

South Africa vs West Indies, 3rd ODI: Fantasy Cricket Tips

Fantasy Tips of The Day

Mitchell Marsh has had an easy time facing India: 311 runs at 104. In addition, the Asian conditions suit his brand of batting: he averages 52 in the continent.

Travis Head is Australia’s top run-getter since 2021: he has collected 606 runs at 67. Steve Smith is next on the list, with 561 runs at 62.

Ravindra Jadeja has done it all against Australia at home: he has 256 runs, 23 wickets, and seven catches in 21 matches.

Only Jadeja has more wickets at home against Australia than Mohammed Shami (22) and Kuldeep Yadav (21), who have a combined strike rate of 32.

Since 2021, Mitchell Starc has picked up 35 wickets at a superb strike rate of 19, registering five three-fors and two five-fors.

Rohit Sharma has featured in the Best11 in four of the last five matches.

In his last 10 ODIs, Suryakumar Yadav has scored five single-digit scores and two ducks.

In the last three games at the venue, pacers accounted for 70% of the wickets, while three of the four hundreds were hammered by the top three batters.

Ready with your team for India vs Australia 3rd ODI? Download the My11Circle fantasy app now & get started!
